whyChooseUs.title: Himalayan Salt Candle Holder Exporter
whyChooseUs.description: Making candle holders with Himalayan salt has become a trend. Because the Himalayan salt comes directly from the salt mines and has a variety of benefits. The Himalayan Salt Candle Holder has natural light as compared to normal lamps.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of Himalayan Salt Candle Holders?
faqs.answer: They create a warm, calming glow and may help purify the air by reducing moisture and pollutants.

faqs.question: How do I clean my salt candle holder?
faqs.answer: Simply wipe it with a dry or slightly damp cloth. Avoid direct exposure to water.

faqs.question: Can I use any type of candle inside the holder?
faqs.answer: Yes, but tea light candles work best as they fit perfectly and enhance the warm glow.

faqs.question: Why is my salt candle holder sweating?
faqs.answer: Salt attracts moisture from the air. Keep it in a dry place and use it regularly to prevent sweating.

faqs.question: Are these candle holders safe to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, they are completely safe as long as they are placed on a stable surface and monitored when lit.
